remarks: Deduction eliminating two antecedents from the four possible cases that result from their true/false combinations.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Mar-2013.)
statement:
4casesdan.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( ps /\ ch ) ) -> th ) $.
4casesdan.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( ps /\ -. ch ) ) -> th ) $.
4casesdan.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( -. ps /\ ch ) ) -> th ) $.
4casesdan.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( -. ps /\ -. ch ) ) -> th ) $.
4casesdan $p |- ( ph -> th ) $.
